articles.title: Galaxy S25 Series: Your AI companion at Aerophone
articles.author: CLOSE
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring advanced AI-powered functions and a sleek design, brought to Philippine stores by Aerophone. The series includes S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra variants, each equipped with a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and up to 1TB of expandable storage. Aerophone offers exclusive pre-order benefits, including freebies and flexible payment options, until February 13, 2025.

articles.title: CCP approves asset acquisition of Crescent Cotton Mills
articles.author: APP
articles.summary: Sultan Spinning Industries (Private) Limited (SSIL) received approval to acquire assets from Crescent Cotton Mills Limited (CCML) to enter the yarn manufacturing and sales market. SSIL's entry is expected to stimulate competition, encouraging competitive pricing, innovation, and increased yarn product availability.

articles.title: 30 Practical Walmart Products That I Consider An Absolute Win To Own
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced a Miracle multipurpose cleaner available at Walmart, known for its effective cleaning capabilities.  Dollar Shave Club offers an unscented shaving butter, while Sonos launched Ace wireless headphones with advanced features and superior sound quality.  Additionally, Ninja introduced the Creami ice cream maker for customizable ice cream at home.

articles.title: OpenAI's Operator is one more step towards AGI, but should we be worried about giving too much power to AI agents?
articles.author: Graham Barlow
articles.summary: OpenAI has released Operator, its first autonomous AI agent, designed to perform tasks on a computer through a web browser, such as booking restaurant tables or buying groceries. The agent is part of OpenAI's broader goal to develop artificial general intelligence (AGI).

articles.title: Samsung's Latest Ad Baffles Netizens, Is it the Galaxy S25 Ultra Or Gemini AI Being Introduced?
articles.author: Swati Pandey
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra advertisement showcases Google's Gemini AI features, highlighting enhanced search and integration across apps, but sparking debate about Samsung's distinct identity. Despite mixed reactions, the Galaxy S25 series emphasizes AI-driven features and on-device processing, signaling a strategic shift towards integrating advanced AI capabilities while focusing on user privacy.

articles.title: I Skipped the Switch, But I'm Getting a Switch 2 at Launch
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2, which will be backward compatible with original Switch games. The Switch 2 is expected to have improved performance and a more comfortable design for adult hands. The console is anticipated to launch with new Mario Kart title.

articles.title: How to Make an Olive Oil Martini, the Gin Classic Shot Through With the Flavor of Olives
articles.author: Jason O'Bryan
articles.summary: The article introduces a unique take on the classic Martini, the Olive Oil Martini, emphasizing the importance of high-quality olive oil. It recommends Ford's Gin for its flavor profile and suggests using Cocchi Americano to enhance the richness and spice of the drink. The author provides a detailed recipe for creating the Olive Oil Martini.

articles.title: Today's Wordle #1316: Hints, clues, and solution for Saturday, January 25
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Wordle, a word-guessing game launched in 2021, challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six tries. The game provides feedback through colored tiles and includes accessibility features like a dark theme and high-contrast mode. Josh Wardle created Wordle.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of 'awesome' wireless earbuds by massive 85% from £130 to just £20
articles.author: Sonia Sharma
articles.summary: Amazon is offering wireless earbuds with ENC noise reduction technology. Customers praise the earbuds for their sound quality, secure fit during sports, and ease of setup. The product is designed with flexible silicone ear hooks and aims to provide clear voice quality during calls.

articles.title: Take a look: NY Mets unveil new road uniform for 2025 season at Amazin' Day
articles.author: Andrew Tredinnick
articles.summary: The NY Mets unveiled a new road uniform for the 2025 season at Amazin' Day.

articles.title: Google Confirms New Feature Boost For Millions Of Android Phones
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Google updated Gemini's abilities on millions of Android phones including Samsung. Gemini can now complete tasks across several apps, integrating with select Samsung apps and Google apps. Gemini Live now supports uploaded images, files, and YouTube videos and is available on Galaxy S24 and S25 phones, while Samsung has plans for Galaxy AI charging at the end of the year.

articles.title: 'Stylish and warm' Next sweatshirt for £23 that look 'fab with jeans'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next offers a heavyweight soft-touch crew neck sweatshirt praised for its comfort and fit, available in sizes X-Small to 2X-Large and colors like Ultimate Black, Navy Blue, and Grey Marl. The sweatshirt features an oversized boyfriend fit with an open-mouth hem. Marks & Spencer also offers a similar oversized longline sweatshirt with dropped shoulders.

articles.title: https://www.facebook.com/NativeHydrateReviews/
articles.summary: Native is extending its product line with Native Hydrate, which includes Native Hydra Boost. Native Hydra Boost is a hydration product emphasizing health and wellness. Native is already known for its natural personal care products and eco-friendly practices.

articles.title: Your next household hack, straight from 'Shark Tank' — our favorites, from $9
articles.author: Rachel Roszmann
articles.summary: Various Shark Tank products are available on Amazon, starting at $9. These include inventions designed to improve home life and simplify tasks, such as banana hats, drain hair-catchers, and detergent-free laundry cleaning eggs. Free shipping is available for Amazon Prime members and on orders over $35.

articles.title: Koei Tecmo surprise-release Ninja Gaiden 2 Black, "definitive" Unreal remaster of the 2008 hack-and-slash
articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.summary: Team Ninja and Koei Tecmo launched Ninja Gaiden 2: Black, an Unreal Engine 5 version of Ninja Gaiden 2. The game released on Steam and Microsoft's Game Pass.

articles.title: Beauty fans set to love €5.49 hair finds from Aldi that will ‘increase shine and tame frizz'
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland is launching the Lacura Hair Repair Oil and Hair Repair Leave-In Conditioning Mask, priced from €5.49, designed to increase shine and tame frizz. Lidl Ireland is introducing an Ionic Hair Dryer for €49.99, a dupe for the Dyson Supersonic, featuring multiple settings and attachments for different styling options.

articles.title: ChatGPT Operator: The 'iPhone' Of Agentic AI, If Done Right
articles.author: Luis E. Romero
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced ChatGPT Operator, a new AI agent designed to automate web-based tasks for consumers and businesses. It utilizes the Computer-Using Agent (CUA) model based on GPT-4o to analyze screenshots and navigate websites, streamlining tasks like booking trips and purchasing supplies. Currently, Operator is available to ChatGPT Pro users in the United States as a research preview, with plans for broader integration in the future.

articles.title: I let TikTok dictate what should go in my Iceland shopping basket
articles.author: Paul McAuley
articles.summary: Iceland has launched a new range of 'effortlessly convenient' protein meals in collaboration with MyProtein, including pasta, fakeaways, banquets, and healthier alternatives. The range features around 20 products, with standout items like Hunters Chicken Pasta (£4.75, 67g protein), Iced Coffee (£1.75, 14g protein), and Beef Hoisin (three for £8 deal). Meat Feast Pasta (£4.75, 66g protein) is also available.

articles.title: Afriwok to connect skilled professionals with Nigerians
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Afriwok is launching a new service marketplace in Nigeria in February 2025. This platform aims to change how individuals find and hire service providers.

articles.title: Mangaluru: Kia Syros unveiled at A R M Kia, Kadri showroom
articles.summary: Garody Steel's managing director, Manoj Kumar, unveiled the new Kia Syros SUV at the A R M Kia showroom in Kadri, Mangaluru. The unveiling marks the introduction of this new vehicle model to the market.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 is still trying to make us love Bixby — here's why that's never going to happen
articles.author: Tom Pritchard
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 with Galaxy AI, integrating both Bixby and Google Gemini. Bixby, upgraded with Samsung's Gauss Large Language Model, manages on-device AI, while Gemini serves as a search tool. The new Bixby features multimodal AI capabilities, improving conversational abilities and natural language understanding.

articles.title: Check Out This Giant AI-Powered "Spice Dispenser" for Dorks Too Timid to Properly Season Their Food
articles.summary: Spicerr is launching a new AI-powered smart spice dispenser that automatically seasons food based on user preferences. It utilizes pre-packaged spice capsules sold by the manufacturer and features a touchscreen interface. The Spicerr collects user data to learn tastes and suggest spice blends.

articles.title: You Can Get a Great $300 Phone as Long as You Answer One Question
articles.author: Mike Sorrentino
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy A16 with a six-year software and security update commitment. Motorola's 2024 Moto G Power 5G features a vegan leather design and wireless charging, while 2025 editions continue this trend. The OnePlus Nord N30 5G has a 108-megapixel camera and fast charging, offering a feature-packed option despite shorter update schedules.

articles.title: Beauty fans can get 30% off 'fully tailored' skincare routine including Lancome and CeraVe
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: Noli has launched a new service that uses AI to provide personalized skincare routines to shoppers. This service helps users discover skincare solutions tailored to their needs by analyzing their skin type. Noli partners with beauty brands like CeraVe, La Roche-Posay, Lancome and Kiehls, offering discounted products and quick delivery.

articles.title: Boots shoppers race to grab half-price £4.49 shampoo for oily hair that has been crowned a 'winner' for removing ALL product build-up
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Noughty Detox Dynamo Clarifying Shampoo, a deep-cleansing shampoo that removes excess oil and buildup, is currently half-price at Boots from January 15 to February 11 2025. It contains peppermint and sorrel leaf extracts to cleanse and purify hair.

articles.title: The 'flattering' £40 M&S floral dress that 'feels more expensive than it is'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer's 'Floral Round Neck Midaxi Tea Dress' is receiving positive customer feedback, with shoppers praising its design, material, and fit. The dress is described as having a 'lovely material - feels like crepe' and is considered to 'look and feel like a much more expensive dress'.

articles.title: I Haven't Bought Conditioner in 25 Years Thanks to This Surprising Shiny Hair Product
articles.author: Tamim Alnuweiri
articles.summary: BioSilk Silk Therapy Original Leave-In Conditioner is highlighted as a universal leave-in conditioner, providing frizz-free hair, shine, and stronger strands. IGK's Rich Kid Wave Enhancing Air-Dry Cream is mentioned for creating soft, defined waves. Aveda Be Curly Curl Enhancer Cream and Andrew Fitzsimons Fantasy Curls Curl Crème are also mentioned as leave-in conditioners.

articles.title: Lidl launches new range of Aesop, Jo Malone & Lush dupes – prices start at £1.99 and you'll save £34 on a luxe body wash
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new range of affordable beauty product 'dupes' on January 30th, including hand washes and shower gels. The range features imitations of luxury brands like Jo Malone (Blackberry & Bay hand wash dupe for £1.99) and Aesop (Deluxe Aromatic Hand Wash dupe for £2.99), along with a Lush-inspired shower gel (Deluxe Lavish Shower Gel for £1.99).

articles.title: Lidl launches new range of Aesop, Jo Malone & Lush dupes – prices start at £1.99 and you'll save £34 on a luxe body wash
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new range of affordable beauty dupes, including shower gels and hand washes, starting from £1.99. These products resemble luxury brands like Aesop, Jo Malone, and Lush. The new Lidl beauty products will be available in stores on January 30th, with further discounts for Lidl Plus members.

articles.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 review: A good balance of price to performance
articles.author: Sahil Bhalla
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Pad 7 in India, with prices starting at ₹27,999. The Pad 7 features an 11.2-inch display, quad-speaker setup with Dolby Atmos, and is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3. Xiaomi also offers a nano-texture display edition, retailing for ₹31,999.

articles.title: FDA Issues First Marketing Authorization for Oral Nicotine Pouches
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The FDA has authorized Swedish Match, a subsidiary of Philip Morris International, to market its ZYN nicotine pouches, marking the first-ever authorization for an oral nicotine pouch product. ZYN pouches are available in various flavors and nicotine strengths, offering adult smokers a potentially less harmful alternative to cigarettes. The FDA's decision was based on data showing that ZYN users switched from other tobacco products and that smokers intending to quit found the product appealing.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner strips down to black bra and underwear for sexy Khy photo-shoot
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Kylie Jenner promoted Khy's latest clothing collection. Jenner stripped down to her undergarments for the promotion of Khy.

articles.title: Belgian Multinational Syensqo Picks Lisbon for New Business Hub
articles.summary: Syensqo has established a Global Business Services (GBS) Centre in Lisbon. The new facility will occupy 2,000 square meters and is expected to support a wide array of business functions, enhancing operational efficiency and driving innovation within the company.

articles.title: ICYMI: the week's 7 biggest tech stories from Oscars AI drama to Samsung's Galaxy S25 launch
articles.author: Hamish Hector
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series, highlighting new Galaxy AI features such as Now Brief and Audio Eraser.  Fitbit alerted users about a battery overheating issue in the Sense and Versa 3 models and is offering compensation. OpenAI has also released its 'Operator' AI agent, designed to assist users with web tasks.

articles.title: Raghavendra Rathore on fashion's most compelling muse—AI
articles.author: Raghavendra Rathore
articles.summary: AI is enabling the introduction of innovative and sustainable textiles, as exemplified by Japanese brands creating yarn blends with reduced waste and innovators designing fabrics that respond to environmental conditions.  Furthermore, AI is facilitating hyper-personalization in the luxury market through virtual stylists and customisation tools, allowing consumers to co-create products like wardrobes and jewelry. This transformation elevates shopping into a deeply personal experience, moving luxury towards a reflection of individual identity.

articles.title: JD Super Honored as 2024 'Annual Responsible Brand' by CHINA PHILANTHROPIST for Mother and Baby Care Initiatives
articles.author: Plentisoft
articles.summary: JD Super, a division of JD.com, launched several new initiatives aimed at supporting parents and reducing parenting costs. These include a 'Free Diaper Donation' initiative in partnership with 48 brands distributing free diapers to families, an 'Allergy-Free' testing service for baby care products, and a 'First Baby Bottle Plan' offering discounted bottles. Additionally, JD Super introduced a 'farm to bottle' direct delivery program for fresh formula.

articles.title: Spot carpet cleaner that 'works really well on stains' has nearly 40% off
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Amazon has marked down a spot cleaner to £78.99 from £129.99. This cleaner utilizes Heatwave technology to maintain consistent water temperature and includes a special attachment for removing stubborn stains. Alternative spot cleaners are available at Currys for £199 and Debenhams for £36.99.

articles.title: [WHY] Nothing to smell here: Why demand for deodorant remains low in Korea
articles.author: MICHAEL LEE
articles.summary: In 2000, Nivea introduced deodorants to the Korean market, aiming to create a new market. Following this, Unilever launched its Rexona deodorant line in Korea in 2003, with Nivea predicting market expansion due to competitor entry. However, deodorant adoption in Korea grew slower than initially anticipated by both Korean and foreign companies.

articles.title: Suzuki's Swift - a light & fun city car that now comes with 12v hybrid efficiency
articles.author: Leah Carroll
articles.summary: Suzuki introduces the latest Swift, a supermini car. The Swift features a 1.2-litre three-cylinder petrol engine with integrated starter generator. The car comes with a 12-volt mild hybrid setup from the lithium-ion battery.

articles.title: Shoppers swap Dyson for 'brilliant' Amazon alternative that's £230 cheaper
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: SMOTURE launched its Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with features similar to Dyson V8 and V7. It is available for £159 and has a 450W motor with up to 55 minutes runtime. Dyson's V8 Advanced is on offer for £229.99 and Amazon has Akitas 3in1 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with a 30% discount for £69.99.

articles.title: If You Like To Be As Efficient As Possible, You'll Appreciate These 32 Under-$30 Home Products
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: This content presents a list of products available on Amazon like Lazy Susan, oil stain remover, shower cleaner, garbage disposal cleaner, dishwasher tablets, humidifier tank cleaner, stove burner covers, NoNo Brackets, dog hair remover, door draft stopper, pet odor eliminator, Goo Gone foaming spray, automatic bleach toilet cleaning system, Wad-Free pads, cabinet door organizer, plastic bag dispenser, shower curtain liner with mesh storage pockets, jetted tub cleaner, red wine stain remover, Grandma's Secret, wood scratch cover, pet urine stain-removing spray, mold and mildew removal gel, Command spray bottle hangers, broom organizer, lid organizer, under-cabinet lid opener, stain-removing cleaning cups, dryer lint brush, sock and underwear organizer, veggie chopper and slim cutlery organizer.

articles.title: The 'classy' £30 Marks & Spencer dress that 'skims lumps and bumps' and 'doesn't crease'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is offering a midi dress praised by shoppers for its fit and comfort. The dress is described as 'stretchy' and 'comfortable,' with some customers requesting more color options. Next has similar product offerings.

articles.title: Finding Out About This Adorable Witch Game People Are Comparing To ‘Wind Waker' and ‘Kiki's Delivery Service' Hurts My Heart
articles.author: Dwayne Jenkins
articles.summary: The game 'Mika and the Witch's Mountain', a fantasy adventure game where the player is a witch delivering packages, has been released on PlayStation and Xbox after being previously available on Steam and Nintendo Switch.  The game involves exploration, flying with a magic broom, and a coming-of-age story.

articles.title: Pre-order Samsung Galaxy S25 Series on Blibli, Get Benefits Up to 9 Million
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Blibli (PT Global Digital Niaga Tbk) is offering an exclusive pre-order campaign for the highly anticipated Samsung Galaxy S25 Series, providing deals and benefits worth nearly IDR 10,000,000. The Galaxy S25 Series will have cutting-edge AI capabilities powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy processor. Blibli is offering both online and offline pre-order options for the Galaxy S25.

articles.title: Starbucks announces Nottingham coffee shop opening date with goodie bags for first 100 customers
articles.author: Lynette Pinchess
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching a new store in Nottingham's Victoria Centre on February 6th at 9 am. The opening will include special offers, a coffee tasting session, and the standard Starbucks menu including coffee, espresso-based drinks, teas, Frappuccino blended beverages, bakery items and sandwiches.

articles.title: First look inside Birmingham New Street shop with robots and an underground showroom
articles.author: Kirsty Bosley
articles.summary: Dreame launched a new store on New Street on February 7, showcasing its diverse product line. The store features robotic vacuums, hair products designed to compete with Dyson, and automatic lawnmowers, all powered by Dreame's motor technology. Dreame plans to expand to Manchester and London in the future.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge brings thin phones back into the spotlight, and I didn't see it coming
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, a super-thin smartphone, anticipated to be thinner than both the Galaxy S25 and the iPhone 16 Pro. Although a release date and price are not yet available, there is speculation about the device's durability, battery life, and potential success in the market, drawing comparisons to past attempts at ultra-thin phones.

articles.title: GeForce RTX 5090's power consumption has been announced: 901W under 1MS
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: NVIDIA's GeForce RTX 5090, a next-generation flagship graphics card, is generating buzz in the tech community. Leaks reveal that the RTX 5090 consumes a staggering 901W of power when operating under a 1 millisecond (ms) load. While Nvidia claims a maximum power consumption of 575W, a recent analysis has shed light on the RTX 5090's power requirements, particularly for users with older power supplies.

articles.title: Mavis Muchena inspires women to thrive through education and mentorship
articles.author: The Chronicle
articles.summary: Mavis Tsamwise Muchena launched the Mavis Women Empowerment Programme in South Africa in September 2024, with plans to expand to Zimbabwe, Zambia, and other African countries in 2025. The program offers training in the production of detergents, skincare products, and fragrances, aiming to empower women through business skills and create sustainable businesses.

articles.title: If You Love Having A Clean Home More Than Literally Anything, Check Out These 45 Products
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of newly available cleaning products designed to tackle various household messes. These include solutions for carpet stains, hard water buildup, mildew removal, and general surface cleaning, with many items receiving positive reviews for their effectiveness and ease of use. Brands like Bissell, Scrub Daddy, and Humble Suds are featured, among others, offering innovative solutions for various cleaning challenges.

articles.title: Blount Fine Foods isn't leaving Fall River. But some of its corporate offices may be.
articles.author: The Herald News
articles.summary: Progresso Soup is launching a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy, which is a limited-time offering during flu and cold season. This new product is referred to as 'soup you can suck on'.

articles.title: ‘Soup drops' are General Mills' latest strategy to revive waning Progresso
articles.author: Detroit news
articles.summary: General Mills released Progresso chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candies, referred to as 'soup drops,' earlier this month. These candies aim to provide a convenient and novel way to experience the taste of Progresso chicken noodle soup.
